Risk Statement: Public object storage exposure leads to customer data breach
Recommended Controls: Block public access plus encryption plus posture monitoring

Risk Statement: Over-permissive IAM increases blast radius for compromised credentials
Recommended Controls: Least privilege review plus PAM plus audit alerts

Risk Statement: Internet-exposed admin access enables unauthorized system compromise
Recommended Controls: Default deny inbound plus VPN or bastion plus flow log alerts

Risk Statement: Missing centralized logging delays detection and response
Recommended Controls: Central SIEM plus alert use cases plus retention standards

Risk Statement: Weak encryption and key management increases breach impact
Recommended Controls: KMS enforcement plus key rotation plus monitoring

Risk Statement: Plain-text secrets enable rapid lateral movement and data access
Recommended Controls: Secrets manager plus rotation plus secrets scanning

Risk Statement: Insufficient backup controls increase downtime and ransomware impact
Recommended Controls: Immutable backups plus restore testing plus deletion alerts
